structure.unit: LEVY AND ASSESSMENT OF PROPERTY TAXES

law.catch_line: Monthly reports from certified electrical inspectors -- Use of information.

text.section: Each electrical inspector certified under KRS 227.489 shall submit a monthly report to the Department of Revenue showing the names and addresses of all persons, firms, or corporations for which inspections were conducted for new buildings, new or relocated mobile homes, and other new or relocated structures during the preceding month. Each building, mobile home, or other structure shall be identified by county and property address, or property location in those instances where the address is insufficient to reveal the physical location of the property.

The information provided shall be used for the purpose of making and maintaining accurate assessment records. The Department of Revenue shall provide to each electrical inspector the necessary forms and instructions for filing the report required under subsection (1).

law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 221, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 263, sec. 1, effective July 14, 1992.
